concept.title: What is Subtraction?
concept.shortdesc: This topic introduces the concept of subtraction.

conbody.p: The subtraction operation gives the difference between two numbers. Subtraction is denoted by the minus '-' sign. It is the inverse process of addition.
This process is mostly used to find how many are left when some things are taken away.

ul.li: If both signs of the integers are positive, the answer will be a positive integer
If both signs of the integers are negative, the answer will be a negative integer
If the signs of the integers are different, subtract the values, and take the sign from the largest integer value.
